queries.sql: INSERT INTO `app_settings` (`name`, `value`, `status`) VALUES ('privacyInput', '<p dir=\"ltr\">Privacy Policy</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Last Updated: 12 Feb 2026</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">At Robinfood, accessible from <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a>, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Robinfood (a brand by Arrikar Foods) and how we use it.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">1. Information We Collect</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">When you visit our website or make a purchase, we collect specific information to facilitate your order and improve your experience:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Personal Information: Name, Email address, Phone number, Shipping address, and Billing address.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Order Information: Details of the products you purchase, date of purchase, and payment status.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Device Information: We automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">2. How We Use Your Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Process and fulfill your orders (including sending you order confirmations, invoices, and shipping updates).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Communicate with you regarding your order or inquiries.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services (only if you have opted in).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Improve and optimize our website (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site).</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">3. Payment Information (Crucial for Razorpay)</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We use Razorpay as our payment gateway. Robinfood (Arrikar Foods) does not store your credit/debit card data. Your purchase transaction data is only used as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">4. Sharing Your Personal Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your Personally Identifiable Information to outside parties, except as described below:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Service Providers: We share your information with third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users (e.g., shipping partners to deliver your rice/products, and Razorpay for payment processing).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Legal Compliance: We may release information when its release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others\' rights, property, or safety.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">5. Cookies</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Like any other website, Robinfood uses \'cookies\'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors\' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users\' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors\' browser type and/or other information.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">6. Data Security</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We have implemented appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. We use Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to ensure that your data is encrypted during transmission.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">7. Changes to This Privacy Policy</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">8. Contact Us</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Brand: Robinfood (Arrikar Foods)</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Email: info@robinfoodsindia.com</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Website: <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a></p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Registered Address: [Insert Full Physical Address Here - MANDATORY]</p> </li> </ul> <p><strong id=\"docs-internal-guid-191986c7-7fff-9c52-d824-2afd590be135\">Phone: [Insert Phone Number Here - MANDATORY]</strong></p>', 1)

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `app_settings` (`name`, `value`, `status`) VALUES ('privacyInput', '<p dir=\"ltr\">Privacy Policy</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Last Updated: 12 Feb 2026</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">At Robinfood, accessible from <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a>, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Robinfood (a brand by Arrikar Foods) and how we use it.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">1. Information We Collect</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">When you visit our website or make a purchase, we collect specific information to facilitate your order and improve your experience:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Personal Information: Name, Email address, Phone number, Shipping address, and Billing address.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Order Information: Details of the products you purchase, date of purchase, and payment status.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Device Information: We automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">2. How We Use Your Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Process and fulfill your orders (including sending you order confirmations, invoices, and shipping updates).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Communicate with you regarding your order or inquiries.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services (only if you have opted in).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Improve and optimize our website (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site).</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">3. Payment Information (Crucial for Razorpay)</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We use Razorpay as our payment gateway. Robinfood (Arrikar Foods) does not store your credit/debit card data. Your purchase transaction data is only used as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">4. Sharing Your Personal Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your Personally Identifiable Information to outside parties, except as described below:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Service Providers: We share your information with third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users (e.g., shipping partners to deliver your rice/products, and Razorpay for payment processing).</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Legal Compliance: We may release information when its release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others\' rights, property, or safety.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">5. Cookies</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Like any other website, Robinfood uses \'cookies\'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors\' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users\' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors\' browser type and/or other information.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">6. Data Security</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We have implemented appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. We use Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to ensure that your data is encrypted during transmission.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">7. Changes to This Privacy Policy</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">8. Contact Us</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Brand: Robinfood (Arrikar Foods)</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Email: info@robinfoodsindia.com</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Website: <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a></p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Registered Address: [Insert Full Physical Address Here - MANDATORY]</p> </li> </ul> <p><strong id=\"docs-internal-guid-191986c7-7fff-9c52-d824-2afd590be135\">Phone: [Insert Phone Number Here - MANDATORY]</strong></p>', 1)
